name: Idle Machine Gun
description:
Welcome to Idle Machine Gun, the game about fighting off suicide bombers and collecting as much metal as possible. My game 

Controls:

At the beginning, you must click for each shot of your gun. Eventually, once you have acquired enough metal, you can buy the Autoshoot upgrade and let the gun fire itself.

To reload, right click on the mouse

To buy upgrades, click on the buttons on the left.

Be careful of your bullet and ammo count on the left as well. You can craft more bullets by using metal.

CODE:

The code and all the other files can be found at https://github.com/toastom/idle-machine-gun-LD41 as well (I think the code is actually included in the zip too).
